thread.title: HomeDepot.com: Up to 75% Off Christmas Clearance (More Items Added)
thread.title_full: HomeDepot.com: Up to 75% Off Christmas Clearance (More Items Added)

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: HomeDepot.com: Up to 75% Off Christmas Clearance (More Items Added)
text:
Have a little extra room in the attic? Head on over to HomeDepot.com where they’ve added more 75% off Christmas clearance items – save on yard decor, trees, lights and more! Shipping is FREE on $49 orders or you may be able to opt for possible free in-store pickup if available near you but note that popular items are selling out fast!
As just one idea, you can score this HUGE Peanuts 12 ft. Long Inflatable Snoopy and Woodstock’s Scene for just $124.50 shipped (regularly $249) – with great reviews! How fun would this be next year?!

Keep your eyes peeled for in-store holiday clearance !
